start.text: Time to dive into the fireworks!
Be ready to pay up, we'll be back before you know it.

start_boss.text: This is gonna cost you extra.
Those who survive a long time on the battlefield start to think they're invincible.
It's not over, buddy. This is where it all starts. You know what I'm talkin' about, right?

retreat.text: Yeah, well. I've had my fill of goin' home without wings.
We're going to start over from scratch.
This is bad, I'm outta here.

pursuing.text: They're in a panic out there. We just might be able to win this.
We gotta strike while the iron's hot!

running.text: They're gonna give us all they've got.
It seems they're on to us.

hull_90.text: These guys know what they're doing.
You fired up? Come shoot me down.

hull_50.text: Things are gonna get tricky if reinforcements show up.

hull_30.text: This is where we go our seperate ways.

death.text: This twisted game needs to be reset.

victory.text: I got a feeling you and me are gonna get along just fine. Buddy.
Yo buddy, you've got everyone fired up and believing in miracles.
Looks like we live to see another day.
